Package persistance

Class UserDDBBDAO

java.lang.Object
persistance.UserDDBBDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserDAO
public class UserDDBBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserDAO
Class that manages database operations regarding registered and virtual users
